勃列日涅夫.definition: Leonid Brezhnev (1906-1982), Soviet statesman, General Secretary of the Communist Party of the USSR 1966-1982

勃利.definition: Boli, a county in Qitaihe 七臺河市|七台河市[Qi1tai2he2 Shi4], Heilongjiang

勃利縣.definition: Boli, a county in Qitaihe 七臺河市|七台河市[Qi1tai2he2 Shi4], Heilongjiang

勃固山脈.definition: Pegu Yoma (mountain range) of south central Myanmar (Burma), separating Irrawaddy and Sittang basins

勃固河.definition: Pegu River of south central Myanmar (Burma)

勃拉姆斯.definition: Brahms (name); Johannes Brahms (1833-1897), German romantic composer

勃海.definition: Han dynasty province around the Bohai sea; renamed 渤海 after the Han

勃然大怒.definition: (idiom) to fly into a rage; to see red

勃然變色.definition: to suddenly change color showing displeasure, bewilderment etc

勃發.definition: to sprout up; to flourish; (of war etc) to break out; rapid growth

勃興.definition: to rise suddenly; to grow vigorously

勃艮第.definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), a medieval kingdom and later a powerful duchy, now a region of France

勃起功能障礙.pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4
